verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H776>land,<s%> if the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of their <S%H4480>coasts,<s%> <S%H7097><s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> him for their watchman: <S%H6822><s%>

If when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> he <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and <S%H2094>warn<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%>

Then whosoever <S%H8085>heareth<s%> <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and taketh not <S%H2094>warning;<s%> <S%H3808><s%> if the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and take him <S%H3947>away,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

He <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and took not <S%H2094>warning;<s%> <S%H3808><s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> upon him. But <S%H1931>he<s%> that taketh <S%H2094>warning<s%> shall <S%H4422>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H8628>blow<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2094>warned;<s%> if the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> them, <S%H1931>he<s%> is taken <S%H3947>away<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> at the <S%H6822>watchman's<s%> <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

So <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> thee a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> therefore thou shalt <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> at my <S%H4480>mouth,<s%> <S%H6310><s%> and <S%H2094>warn<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> me.

When I <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> O <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man, thou shalt surely <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H4191><s%> if thou dost <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at thine <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Nevertheless, <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of his <S%H4480>way<s%> <S%H1870><s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it; if he do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Therefore, O <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3651>Thus<s%> ye <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> and our <S%H2403>sins<s%> be <S%H5921>upon<s%> us, and <S%H587>we<s%> pine <S%H4743>away<s%> in them, <S%H349>how<s%> should we then <S%H2421>live?<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I have no <S%H518>pleasure<s%> <S%H2654><s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H4480>way<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> ye, <S%H7725>turn<s%> ye from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>ways;<s%> <S%H1870><s%> for <S%H4100>why<s%> will ye <S%H4191>die,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

Therefore, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H6588>transgression:<s%> as for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3782>fall<s%> thereby in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H7725>turneth<s%> from his <S%H4480>wickedness;<s%> <S%H7562><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H2421>live<s%> for his righteousness in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H2398>sinneth.<s%>

When I shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> that he shall surely <S%H2421>live;<s%> <S%H2421><s%> if <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> his own <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousnesses<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> but for his <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>committed,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> for it.

Again, when I <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> Thou shalt surely <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H4191><s%> if he <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H4480>sin,<s%> <S%H2403><s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right;<s%>

If the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> give <S%H7999>again<s%> that he had <S%H1500>robbed,<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H1115>without<s%> <S%H6213>committing<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity;<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H2421><s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>

None <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of his <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H2398>committed<s%> shall be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%> unto him: he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right;<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live.<s%> <S%H2421><s%>

Yet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal:<s%> <S%H3808><s%> but as for <S%H1992>them,<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%> <S%H3808><s%>
When the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> from his <S%H4480>righteousness,<s%> <S%H6666><s%> and <S%H6213>committeth<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> he shall even <S%H4191>die<s%> thereby.

But if the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H4480>wickedness,<s%> <S%H7564><s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5921>thereby.<s%>

Yet ye <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%> <S%H3808><s%> O ye <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you every <S%H376>one<s%> after his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> month, in the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that one that had <S%H6412>escaped<s%> out of <S%H4480>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3389><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5221>smitten.<s%>

Now the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> me in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he that was <S%H6412>escaped<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and had <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and I was no more <S%H481>dumb.<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5750><s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> they that <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H2723>wastes<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> and he <S%H3423>inherited<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> but <S%H587>we<s%> are <S%H7227>many;<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> us for <S%H4181>inheritance.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Ye <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and shall ye <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land?<s%>

Ye <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> your <S%H2719>sword,<s%> ye <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H8441>abomination,<s%> and ye <S%H2930>defile<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife:<s%> and shall ye <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land?<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> thou <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> they <S%H834>that<s%> are in the <S%H2723>wastes<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and him <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to be <S%H398>devoured,<s%> and they <S%H834>that<s%> be in the <S%H4679>forts<s%> and in the <S%H4631>caves<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of the <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

For I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> most <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> <S%H4923><s%> and the <S%H1347>pomp<s%> of her <S%H5797>strength<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> that <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H369><s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through.<s%>

Then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> most <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4923><s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>

Also, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> still are <S%H1696>talking<s%> against thee <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H7023>walls<s%> and in the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2297>one<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> <S%H259>another,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935>Come,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee as the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3996>cometh,<s%> and they <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee as my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1697>words,<s%> but they will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H6213>show<s%> much <S%H5690>love,<s%> but their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1215>covetousness.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> thou art unto them as a very <S%H5690>lovely<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> of one that hath a <S%H3303>pleasant<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and can play well on an <S%H5059>instrument:<s%> <S%H3190><s%> for they <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1697>words,<s%> but they <S%H6213>do<s%> them <S%H369>not.<s%>

And when this cometh to <S%H935>pass,<s%> <S%H2009>(lo,<s%> it will <S%H935>come,)<s%> then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.
